description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1sth7","text":"This protocol describes the steps to prepare imaging medium for Saccharomyces cerevisiae with high refractive index. This medium is optimized for fluorescence imaging by the reduction of auto-fluorescence through an abundance of Adenine [1] and the repression of of the Met-promoted pp7- CP expression [2].","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d6km7","text":"Add and resolve Iodixanol (~Optiprep) crystals.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akcdg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ae1e4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6jdcb","text":"For reasons of cost efficiency it possible to use a portion of the mixed solution with 1.4 and add the Iodixanol crystals to increase the RI.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a5u0q","text":"! steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d4m6e","text":"Add Iohexol (Histodenz) powder.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3c2u6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4jtou","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58b8n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fm28","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6v8eq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ibdl","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27fpc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54spa","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3c1k9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d2jae","text":"For reasons of cost efficiency it possible to use a portion of the mixed solution to add the Iohexol for the RI adjustment.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dodnj","text":"! Be aware that the Glucose 20% volume added in step 3 must be adjusted to the correct ratio for refractive index adjusted portion used!","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","10_0":"","10_1":"","11_0":"","11_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","7_0":"","7_1":"","8_0":"","8_1":"","9_0":"","9_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[100,100],"data":[["Percent (w/v) Histodenz/SC-XX medium","Resulting Refractive Index(20 °C)"],["0","1.3362"],["10","1.3494"],["20","1.3659"],["30","1.3824"],["40","1.3988"],["50","1.4153"],["60","1.4318"],["70","1.4482"],["80","1.4647"],["90","1.4812"],["100","1.4976"]],"guid":"FF7FEDE2466E4650AB0794FAF7FB53F1","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"blrj5","text":"The spreadsheet shows the weight to volume percent and the resulting RI in the SC-XX medium","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Percent (w/v) Histodenz/SC-XX medium","Resulting Refractive Index(20 °C)"],["0","1.3362"],["10","1.3494"],["20","1.3659"],["30","1.3824"],["40","1.3988"],["50","1.4153"],["60","1.4318"],["70","1.4482"],["80","1.4647"],["90","1.4812"],["100","1.4976"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bhk0q","text":"Warming the medium on the stirring plate helps resolving the powders.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
